name: Blossom (Nashoute, gourki, moalludovic)
description:
At "Blossom" cemetery, death is not the end. Come and grow flowers near the graves to start a new cycle.
"Blossom" is a contemplative game where you grow flowers in a cemetery and observe the effects.

Credits : 

Ophélie Abbonato - 3d Artist/particle artist

Ludovic Moal- Dev Search/procedural art/Environmental design

Eloan Lagier - Dev gameplay

Yi Ming Chiu - 3d Artist/painter

Emilie Fournier (Nashoute) - Procedural texture/Bush artist
